attributes.action: Implement 2 to 5 lessons in a skid car before applying for a driving license.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These are modified car, which can safely (and at low speed) recreate the effects / conditions of driving on ice, bad roads etc.

This would be highly beneficial to learners as it allows them to learn the best/correct way to respond in a case where something goes wrong... (how to drive on icey roads, how to recover, how to use ABS properly).
